enhanced_posts.text:
Isn’t it wild that to read posts from our own presidents—essentially public service announcements—I have to scroll past MyPillow ads, sketchy dental gimmicks, and digital snake oil? If this isn’t a race to the bottom, I honestly don’t know what is.

#trump #truthsocial
